item.title: Report X-2025010569
item.description:
Report X-2025010569

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-14
  • City: NASHVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg Info ( TRK NBR=283977671474 PKG TYPE=Package (box/drum/jerrican/composite) PHY STATE=Liquid TRANSPORTATION PHASE=Loading ) Commodity Info ( UNDG NBR=UN1791 CLASS=80 QTY UOM=Liquid - Milliliter PSN TEXT=Hypochlorite solution PKG GRP=III SPILLED QTY=0 CONTAINER CAPACITY=1000 CONTAINER UOM=Liquid - Milliliter MATERIAL CONSTRUCTION=C - Plastic NUMBER IN SHIPMENT=6 NUMBER FAILED=0 INNER PKG TYPE=1 - Bottle TOTAL AMT IN EACH CONTAINER=1000 TOTAL UOM=Liquid - Milliliter )Spill. Undeclared Hazmat (no labels/markings on outer pkg). Approx 40ml lost from 1 of 6x500ml bottles Siemens RD702 Probe cleaner, loose cap. 6x1000ml Siemens RD703 Probe cleaner also included. Packing list available in QR code under TRK ID.

item.title: Report X-2025010552
item.description:
Report X-2025010552

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-13
  • City: NASHVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Please note that this must be considered Unprocessed despite the 96 applied by MESQ. The markings on the drum and SDS for Ecolab 6115982 state "UN1791, Hypochlorite solutions (Sodium hypochlorite), 8, III." The OP-900 states "UN1824, Sodium hydroxide solution, 8, II." Spill. 3.81lb lost of 54.21lb or 5gal 1H2 drum Ecolab 6115982, loose cap/lid.

item.title: Report X-2025010610
item.description:
Report X-2025010610

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-13
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A fiberboard box with signs of a release was found during sort operations at the MEMH location. The fiberboard box contained a steel drum that was damaged on the bottom chime causing the release. It was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.

item.title: Report X-2025010599
item.description:
Report X-2025010599

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-03
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On Jan 3rd during the AM sort a package was found that was showing signs of leakage. The package was marked and labeled as UN2735, Amines, Liquid, Corrosive, 8, II. I appears that one of the bottle was crushed, however it is unknown how the damage occured. The package was placed into a steel salvage drum and the shipper was contacted for an amended shipper's declaration.

item.title: Report X-2025010424
item.description:
Report X-2025010424

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-13T21:12:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-09
  • City: NASHVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg Info ( TRK NBR=423532996090 PKG TYPE=Package (box/drum/jerrican/composite) PHY STATE=Liquid TRANSPORTATION PHASE=Unloading ) Commodity Info ( UNDG NBR=UN3265 CLASS=80 QTY UOM=Liquid - Gallon PSN TEXT=Corrosive liquid, acidic, organic, n.o.s. PKG GRP=III SPILLED QTY=0 CONTAINER CAPACITY=1 CONTAINER UOM=Liquid - Gallon MATERIAL CONSTRUCTION=C - Plastic NUMBER IN SHIPMENT=1 NUMBER FAILED=0 INNER PKG TYPE=1 - Bottle TOTAL AMT IN EACH CONTAINER=1 TOTAL UOM=Liquid - Gallon TECH NAME=(HYDROXY ACETIC ACID) )Spill. 2 Undeclared Hazmats. One 1gal plastic bottle Zep Mold/mildew stain remover lost 4oz from loose cap. 1gal bottle Zep Shower Tub Tile Cleaner also included. Nonhaz: 1gal bottle of Zep premium carpet shampoo & 1gal bottle Odoban 3-in-1 Carpet cleaner. No orientation arrows. Box height is 7.5". Bottles height is 12.5"

item.title: Report X-2025010351
item.description:
Report X-2025010351

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-13T21:12:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-31
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A fiberboard box with an odor was presented to the MEMH spill office. While investigating the shipment the spill agent observed a release. Inside of the fiberboard box was a single metal bucket in a plastic bag sealed with a zip tie and bubble wrap for dunnage. The lid of the bucket came open spilling the contents inside of the fiberboard box. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.

item.title: Report X-2025010350
item.description:
Report X-2025010350

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-13T21:12:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-29
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A fiberboard box was presented to the MEMH spill office with an odor. While investigating the shipment the spill agent observed that the plastic bucket inside was damaged on the bottom causing a release. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.
